name: Parachute Animals
description:
How to play

Select two or more matching animals to make them disappear.

You have to hurry, because new animals are constantly falling from the sky!

Credits

Sprites by Snow Run Games,  Mike Dailly,  Gamelves.com,  nyarlko.

Background by MadFireOn.

Music by Snabisch,  Satch Dev, Sidearm Studio,  AntumDeluge.
